channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Tiburon officials back flood study for Greenwood Cove Drive
item.description: $200k proposal aims to ease chronic road problems tied to tides and runoff
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Mallard Pointe faces delays as city flags incomplete permits, tenant-benefit issues
item.description: Revisions were expected as routine back-and-forth process enters next phase
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Sports Shout: Local polo players lead teams to medal finishes at national Junior Olympics
item.description: Tiburon water polo players help Sharks win three medals at Junior Olympics, including bronze in top-tier 12U Championship Platinum division.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Hessel

item.title: Everyday Encounters: Two friends from different corners of the world bond over new lives in Tiburon
item.description: From Buenos Aires and Santa Clarita to Tiburon, two 27-year-olds find friendship, balance and bright futures in the Bay Area.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Garden Plot: Hydrangeas sport plentiful summer blooms
item.description: Hydrangeas thrive in summer — columnist Diane Lynch shares growing tips, drying advice and favorite cultivars for local gardens.
item.dc:creator: Diane Lynch

item.title: Crib Notes: Nautical West Shore Road estate is on the market for $17.9 million
item.description: A 5,370-sq-ft West Shore home with two boat lifts and sweeping bay views lists for $17.9M after renovations and a price cut.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Picks of the Week: Third annual Jewish festival at Zelinsky Park; Johnny Cash tribute for Concerts in the Park
item.description: Tiburon, Belvedere host free Aug. 10 events: Jewish fest with food, music and crafts; Johnny Cash tribute concert at 4 p.m.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Pick of the Week: Tiburon country singer returns for concert at HopMonk
item.description: Tiburon native Lockwood Barr, Nashville songwriter and musician, performs Aug. 9 at HopMonk Tavern with Megan Barker and Caroline de Lone.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Tiburon resident wins best scone at fair
item.description: Paradise Cay’s Kim Gormley wins Marin Fair scone crown with lemon zest recipe; her vegan zucchini bread takes second in breads.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Transportation study flags Tiburon, Belvedere among 19 areas at risk from sea rise
item.description: Sea-level rise study highlights Tiburon, Belvedere risks; town to vote on funding to launch adaptation plan under SB 272
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Russia quake triggered 19-hour tsunami advisory; local surge fizzled
item.description: Tiburon Peninsula officials rely on AlertMarin, but just 34% in 94920 are signed up
item.dc:creator: Kevin Hessel

item.title: Tiburon flood officials back $800k in design costs for creek restoration
item.description: Tiburon flood board backs design contracts for Bel Aire creek upgrades after trimming nearly $400K from original estimate.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez
